name: Cougars of the Forest
description:
Walking in the forest . .suddenly . . .noooooo!

Welcome to Greyhawk, the wild land of magic and adventure. This adventure calls for you to take control of a wild Cougar. Your cougar will build his skill by completing various quests. Along the way, you will develop your hunting skills. Don't forget to drink water and stay hydrated. This game contains Dragons.

We are excited to finally bring an adventure game that many of your have been asking for. Its a long form game, with customizable family members, cub training, and magical elements. This game is the second game in our Epic Quest series.


--Realistic Animal Features
Hunting, Eating, Drinking, and Carrying your prey are all part of the experience.


--8 Parts
The game is broken down into 8 parts, each one more difficult then the previous

--Craft your Magic
Collect the Magic Books, Potions, and Magic Items to Craft your magic spells

--Family Members
Find your family members and use them to team up against your enemies.

--Customizations
We allow you to customize you Cougar Color, Markings, and even Call Sound.

--Epic Final Battle
The final battle is difficult to win. You will need to use your magic and clan to win the battle.

--Animal Enemies
Enemies include Deer, Wolf, Giant Spiders, Scorpions, Fire Wolves, Eagles, and many more.

Epic Quest is a series of games we created at Wild Foot. We've taken all your suggestions and tried to combine them into this game.

We would really love to hear from you. We know this game is not perfect, but we are ready to make it better. Be sure and stop by our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames for updates.   We welcome your constructive criticism. Please email your suggestions. Good luck!
